short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Twitter (X) Tweet or Thread in easy to read format and to save as PDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View tweets or threads in threadnavigator.com so that it is easy-to-read, can be saved as PDF or to your Notion.

ğŸ“Features:

- Unroll X (Twitter) thread for easy reading.
- Save tweet as PDF for Free (on website).
- Save tweet/threads to your Notion (on website).

ğŸ˜ŠHow it works:

- Install the extension.
- Go to twitter.com, open the tweet or thread you want to save.
- Right click anywhere and select "open in ThreadNavigator"
- Select "Save as PDF" or "Save to Notion".
